name: Klonoa 3D Concept
description:
this is a concept for if klonoa had 3d gameplay. keep in mind i made this just for fun, but i hope you enjoy if you want to check it out :D

this only contains 2 levels. a test level and a quickly made sci-fi themed level



Controls:

Jump = Space,RMB

Shoot = R,LMB

Quit = Esc

Move = WASD

Controller Supported
